text: 6|52|achim jeonyeog-eulo junimkke guwonhaneun jadeul-eul chubanghaji malla geudeul eun hananimkke eunhyeleul galguhago iss nola geudaega geudeul-eul gyesanhal amu leon chaeg-imdo eobs-eumyeo ttohan geudeul-i geudaeleul gyesanhal amuleon chaeg-im-i eobsgeo neul geudaega geudeul-eul chubanghandamyeon joe jieunja gaunde issnola
